name: PAW Match
description:
THE GAME IS IN EARLY ACCESS


HELP STRAY ANIMALS TO LIVE THE DREAM LIFE IN THE SUPER FUN PUZZLE GAME!
Become the director of the Pet Assistance Workers team and lead on their way of rescuing animals from cruel life.

FEATURES:
● TREAT animals from diseases
● GROOM poor creatures to make them look fresh and healthy
● MAKEOVER style of your pets
● DECORATE special rooms for animals in your shelter
● SOLVE addictive puzzles with challenging obstacles!
● BLAST through levels with exciting power-ups with explosive benefits!
